scripts.test:core: cd frontend && bun run test -- --run && cd ../backend && uv run pytest tests/test_core_apis.py -v
scripts.commit: echo 'Use Cursor\'s Git tab for AI-generated commits or run: bunx cz'
scripts.changelog: echo 'Changelog generation available via commitlint ecosystem'
scripts.version: echo 'Version management available via commitlint ecosystem'
scripts.quality:frontend: cd frontend && bun run lint && bunx tsc --noEmit
scripts.quality:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check app/ && uv run mypy app/
scripts.ci:test: bun run test && cd backend && uv run pytest tests/ -v
scripts.ci:lint: bun run lint && cd backend && uv run ruff check app/ && uv run ruff format --check app/
scripts.ci:build: cd frontend && bun run build && cd ../backend && uv run python -c 'import app.main'
scripts.ci:all: bun run ci:lint && bun run ci:test && bun run ci:build
